channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache PDFBox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache PDFBox

item.title: CVE-2021-27807|2024-08-03T21:33:15.892Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20pdfbox
item.description: A carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an infinite loop while loading the file. This issue affects Apache PDFBox version 2.0.22 and prior 2.0.x versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-27906|2024-08-03T21:33:16.426Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20pdfbox
item.description: A carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an OutOfMemory-Exception while loading the file. This issue affects Apache PDFBox version 2.0.22 and prior 2.0.x versions.
